mapper.select: SELECT SUM(sub.total_wishlist_count) AS total_wishlist_count FROM ( SELECT sr.company_id, COUNT(w.wishlist_id) AS total_wishlist_count FROM study_room sr LEFT JOIN wishlist w ON sr.room_id = w.room_id WHERE sr.company_id = #{company_id} -- 여기서는 파라미터로 받은 company_id 사용 GROUP BY sr.company_id ) AS sub
